newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Bank Negara borrows for 1-mth deposit at 7.05 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bank Negara borrows for 1-mth deposit at 7.05 pct.

text.p: Bank Negara Malaysia said it borrowed for a one-month deposit at an unchanged 7.05 percent as part of its open market intervention operations.
Bank Negara regularly intervenes in the domestic money market to either keep liquidity under check or set interest rates.
